Text.Page:
Killian's servants have been appearing nearby lately. They haven't done anything yet, but that just makes me even more anxious.

We've got to stop them before they can carry out whatever horrible plans Killian has brainwashed them into.

If you got rid of the beast tamers, that would probably significantly weaken their plans.
Great work. I have to say, I feel a lot better knowing I'm more than spitting distance away from anything having to do with Killian.
